tool_description: Get links to articles about climate change
name: Weather API
title: Weather API

api_list.name: Get individual news source
api_list.description: Gets news about climate change from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-api30.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-api30.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-api30.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-api30.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all climate change articles
api_list.description: THis endpoint will return back all news about climate change from all over the world.
